Package src.main.java

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
src.main.java.Controller
public class Controller
extends javafx.application.Application
The Controller class handles EventHandlers and contains the main and start methods. The Controller class is the "main" class and intializes the Java Program.
Author:
Elijah Haberman

    • setHandlerForDragAndDrop

      public void setHandlerForDragAndDrop​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imgView)
      Handler for Drag and Drop Event. Changes cursor to closed hand when dragging Allows user to pick up image from Plant Search Pane and drag it to the DrawGardenPane.
      Parameters:
      imgView - ImageView of plant.

    • dragAndDrop

      public void dragAndDrop​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, javafx.scene.image.Image img)
      Enables drag and drop by finding the plants X and Y Coordinate in relation to the cursor. Updates plant X and Y when moved, and the garden rating system.
      Parameters:
      event - MouseEvent picks the top most node (ImageView) and moves its coordinates.
      img - Image the image of the plant.

    • setHandlerForDrawButton

      public void setHandlerForDrawButton​(javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton drawButton)
      Handler for Draw Button. Changes cursor to crosshair when selected and enables drawing on Canvas.
      Parameters:
      drawButton - ToggleButton that if toggled allows drawing on Canvas.

    • setHandlerForEraseButton

      public void setHandlerForEraseButton​(javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton eraseButton)
      Handler for Erase Button. Changes cursor to crosshair when selected and enables erasing of lines drawn.
      Parameters:
      eraseButton - ToggleButton that if toggled allows erasing of drawings on Canvas.

    • setHandlerForRemoveClick

      public void setHandlerForRemoveClick​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imgView)
      Handler for Removing ImageView. When doubled clicked or right clicked the ImageView will be removed from the DrawGardenPane. Rating will also be updated.
      Parameters:
      imgView - ImageView image of plant.

    • removeClick

    • setHandlerForPlantDragged

      public void setHandlerForPlantDragged​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imgView)
      Handler for dragging plant node. Cursor is set to closed hand when dragging plant. Calls movePlant to move the image.
      Parameters:
      imgView - ImageView image of plant.
